title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
description: How well do you know the journey of the long-lived elf mage?

questions.question: What type of being is Frieren?
questions.explanation: Frieren is an elf with an extremely long lifespan, which is central to the story's themes about time and memory.

questions.question: Frieren was part of the Hero's party that defeated the Demon King.
questions.explanation: Frieren traveled with Himmel the Hero, Heiter the Priest, and Eisen the Warrior to defeat the Demon King.

questions.question: What is the name of Frieren's apprentice?
questions.explanation: Fern is Frieren's apprentice, a talented young mage who was raised by Heiter.

questions.question: What is Frieren's hobby that she pursues throughout her journey?
questions.explanation: Frieren loves collecting spells, even seemingly useless ones like magic to make flowers bloom!

questions.question: Stark is a cowardly warrior despite being incredibly strong.
questions.explanation: Stark was trained by Eisen and is very powerful, but he struggles with self-confidence and often acts cowardly despite his abilities.

questions.question: Who was Frieren's master who taught her magic?
questions.explanation: Flamme was a legendary human mage who took in Frieren and taught her magic, including how to hide her mana.

questions.question: The demons in Frieren can feel genuine emotions like humans.
questions.explanation: In Frieren's world, demons are revealed to mimic human emotions and language as hunting techniques, but don't actually feel them.

questions.question: What does Frieren seek at Aureole, the land where souls rest?
questions.explanation: Frieren's journey is motivated by her desire to reach Aureole to speak with Himmel one more time and tell him things she never said.

questions.question: What is the name of the powerful elf mage who has lived even longer than Frieren?
questions.explanation: Serie is an ancient elf mage who was Flamme's master, making her Frieren's 'grand-master'. She has collected nearly every spell in existence!
